PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02502023-03-22PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of NEIL RUSSON of York County, New Brunswick, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective May 9, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of NEIL RUSSON of York County, New Brunswick, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective May 9, 2023.
